tool_description: Credit card number validator or generator
title: Card Validator

api_list.name: Validate Credit Card Number
api_list.description: This endpoint will validate credit card number is valid or not.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://card-validator.p.rapidapi.com/validate"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "card-validator.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Generate Fake Credit Card Number
api_list.description: This endpoint create a fake and valid credit card number with desired length.

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://card-validator.p.rapidapi.com/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "card-validator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
